title: This is a supposedly original hand lettered sign. I suspect a font
author: keymarcus

comments.content:
**Arbusto** by Dave Simpson [1999] part of Sign DNA font collection  
The initial |O| is modified.
TY. I have been attempting to locate this font via your ID and have been unsuccessful on Sign DNA and other sits as well as GOOGLE. Any additional info you might be able to share? TY again

The family name was "Arbusto DNA". You are right, this is probably an old font which is not included in the latest Sign DNA collection.  
I can't find legitimate source for this font but you can always send a message and ask about it on the official Sign DNA site:  
 [http://signdna.com/shop/index.php?main\_page=contact\_us](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415181044/http:/signdna.com/shop/index.php?main_page=contact_us "http://signdna.com/shop/index.php?main\_page=contact\_us")
